content.detailedDescription:
The witness took her dog out at 6:30 pm (cdt) in the back yard. her attention was drawn to the object with flashing lights at treetop level.
the object was a cylinder, approximately 40-50 feet in length and 3 feet
in width with 4 flashing lights. it appeared to be moving at approximately
20 mph.  the object was moving toward the witness, but suddenly veared to 
the right.  the witnesses dog did not react normally, the dog wanted to go
immediately back inside of he home.  the object was silent, and had no wings.  it was too low and too slow to be an aircraft.
content.summary: Silver cylinder with 4 flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
I have been observing the bright light rising in the wsw sky for the past few months...It was observable about 7 p.M. at night in late september early october.  i've looked up some reactions to this "venus planet" on youtube and many people don't believe that it is venus.  i stopped and took some zoomed in photos the beginning of october, but the quality of my cellphone camera is pretty crappy, but judge for yourself on these two pictures that i am uploading on here what you make of it.

i am someone who has had many sightings and have reported most all to mufon so when i see an unusual, unexplainable light that just looks out of place, i try to observe and capture it if possible on photo.


thanks.
content.summary: Bright light wsw sky for weeks

content.detailedDescription: On november 1st around 4pm central standard time my boyfriend and i were driving on hwy 20 west bound to fort dodge, iowa. we had just picked up my children from independence iowa around 3pm. we all were in the vehicle at the time it happened. at approximately 4:15pm my boyfriend spotted a round circular shape in the sky just above the treetops by the steamboat rock exit on hwy 20 going westbound. he pointed to it and asked if i saw what he did. i said yes and we both watch it turn at a 75 degree angle flying south just above the treeline. we then pulled over on the right side of hwy 20 and watched it.  it stayed stationary after that for about 2 minutes and then just vanished reappearing on the south side of our vehicle in a vertical position. no lights were seen or sound heard. after staying vertical for a few seconds it shot straight up in the sky and disappeared. then reappeared on the other side of our van. both of my children saw it and were able to tell us exactly what shape and color it was. it scared my children so much i had to sit with them in the back seat.  after reappearing on the one side it vanished and we didn't see it again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Getiing my kids. say a round shape in the sky. no lights. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 11.4.13 at approximately 19:30 hours, we were in our barn, taking care of our animals; feeding and watering. i was outside the barn filling the water tank.  i turned around just to look at the sky like i always do and in the southwestern sky i saw 3 orange orbs clustered together light up then a forth orb that was by itself light up just as the 3 orbs began to 'fade' then disappear, the fourth orb then disappeared. it was a little further south than the cluster.  the total length of time they were visable was at a count of 2 at most.  it was when i saw the first three orbs that i called for my husband who was inside the barn tending to one of our horses, but by the time he made it outside, they were gone.  we waited approximately 3 - 5 minutes just to see if they came back which the 3 orb cluster did.  it was only visable for a count of 2 again but it was further north than were i had originally found them. trees blocked our view from where we were at that time so i don't know if they came back.  i checked in the front of our house but didn't see them again.  they were orange in color.  they gradually lit up reached what i thought to be the brightest then faded away.  this was for both sightings. there was no movement noticable while they were lit and the only 'movement' i can say i noticed is when the second set of 3 orbs appeared further north.

my first thought was flares but that would have left more of a noticable trail or noted movement.  there was none.  i knew it wasn't headlights as it was to far up in the sky for that. the sky was clear so there was no reflection on the clouds.  i don't know what it was and really don't have any sort of explanation other than they were orange orbs.

i have never seen anything unusal that i couldn't explain as something 'normal' or ordinary. i am always on the look out for these events but this was the first for both my husband and myself.
content.summary: 1st sighting 1 group of 3 orbs, one single orb, 2nd sighting 3 orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on hoyt st just south of i 70, i was just coming up on a armory and just happened to look to my left and had to do a double take. there was an object floating i would say about 20 ft off the ground above a fleet of army trucks, the armory looked pretty deserted, and i was about 50 yards from the object. when i first say the object i was kind of seeing it from a front view which was a very quick look, it appeared to have some sort of wings, and i believe a tail, it was dark in color, maybe black or gun metal gray, it had like a sparkly silver strip on the side, and very stealth with sharp edges and corners on it side, and there was absolutely no sound, no dust or debris flying from some sort of engines holding it in place, it was just floating there. i had too look away because of traffic and when i turned back about 30 seconds later the object had moved at least 2 miles west, not a sound, i had to look away again because of traffic and looked back i could no longer see the object, i would say this all took place with in 1 or 2 minutes, and i will tell you it was the strangest thing i had ever seen, it was just floating there, but i would have to say that i believe it was man made because of the look, but as far as i know we don't have anything that can act like that.
content.summary: Space shuttle crossed with a stealth fighter floating about 20 ft off ground

content.detailedDescription: Went outside and saw a very bright light in the south west.Towards the gulf of mexico.Fl.My eyes are not great so i got my bushnells.Fouced in and saw 2 objects side by side.Both 2 lights like landing lights but did not move.Was not a plane.Or anything like one.Dont really know what i was looking at that why i contacted you.Maybe you can tell me.7:20 pm nov.4th.2013.Still there@7:45 pm.
content.summary: Saw on my bushnells 2 bright wht lites double.Dont know?

content.detailedDescription: My parents and i were on our road in the vehicle drinking out of town. my dad as looking up in the sky and sa a bright light, then noticed it was moving. i first thought it was a star. the object followed the vehicle, turned when we turned,sped up with us, when lost in the woods it held back a little but caught up with us when we were visible again. then when my dad and i exited the vehicle, it hovered for several minutes while we went into the store, and was still there when we got out of the store. my dad and i were both freaked out that something would be following us and speeding up so quickly alongside it. we knew it had to be a ufo. i lost track of it when i entered another house.
content.summary: Bright light resembling a star, but bigger and brighter

content.detailedDescription: I am seeing 4 different kinds of crafts every single night in my area they hover they land they make formations occasionally they shout white light of them occasionally i have even see one shoot another craft off of it. it is really starting to freak my children and myself out... there is occasionally a white light blinking almost like a beacon in the field across from my house i live in a rural area. there are like i said different types but what worries me is i am seeing them every single night now. even on cloudy nights hey come low enough to where i can see them. i don't know if this is government or et. we have never been hurt or affected by them just very un nerved. i welcome you come investigate or give me some feed back. i have some pictures but they are blurry my camera is not that great so i would love to see what these things really are!!!! these things hover down below the tree lines or they fly off or a lot of the time they i will get ired and just head in the house and say oh well lol i see these every night while i am out smoking which i know is a really bad habit but i notice more than most cause i am out every night. i guarantee if you come out a few nights you wont be disappointed. i have gotten to the point i am so used to it now i actually have been studying where they go and what they are doing... i first started noticing these a couple months ago and it hs just gotten busier as the days go on!!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.shape: Circle,   Oval,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Triangle
content.summary: Huge uptick in ufos seeing them on a nightly basis now they land they hover 4 different kind i noticed my children and father are seeing these as well e

content.detailedDescription:
Again, the same thing i have seen for months . i set up my camera on my deck ( clear view to the west of salt lake valley) and captured an object that appears out of nowhere . it hovers , glows changes colors. then moves straight up, side to side and heads north. 
another object appears a few minutes later and same thing happens .

 i changed the video timing to make it faster . my original video is 25 minutes long .
i am so glad other people are noticing this over our valley.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red object hovers and moves erratically

content.detailedDescription: Saw a bright star like object behind a tree move to my left, i followed it it stopped changed color, moved straight . was white and changed to a green blue color. no noise. it was moving very fast.
content.summary: Looked out window saw a bright star like object behind a tree move to my left changed dir.Moved  away from me .

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from the leonardo, a museum in downtown salt lake city, heading east from 200 east and on the north side of 500 south. it was 8:58pm, and i was walking with a friend, both of us witnessed the object.

i first noticed the object as i am a natural sky watcher, i like to look up and see what stars, aircraft, clouds, etc. are in the sky at any given time. i noticed a bright point of very clearly orange light north west of our position. i pointed it out to my friend, as it was noticeably unusual from anything i normally see in the sky. the very bright orange light did not blink, and seemed to move relatively slow, and was completely silent.

i didn't know what to think of the object at first since it was clearly not an airplane or helicopter, it was to bright and close to be a star or satellite, and it was a steady, constant light.

the light moved from north to south in what appeared to be a subtle arch from west to east and back west along it's path. as the object passed the leonardo in my sight line it began to grow in size. as it continued south it expanded to what i might guess to be the size of large car, but it was not possibly for me to tell it's actual size and distance. the intensity of the light diminished as the object expanded and continue it's smooth path/decent. i lost sight of it as it dipped below the roof line of the near by buildings on the south side of 500 south.

the expanded object looked like a blob of glowing orange around a dark or not visible interior, like a glowing viscous fluid over a glass bubble, though the object did not appear to be a perfect sphere. the uneven appearance of the glow around the object gave the impression the object had spin and a subtle wobble.

i felt excited to see something so unusual, and i felt the object was beautiful and transfixing. i pulled out my phone and snapped a (unfortunately, slightly motion blurred) photo of the object in it's smallest, brightest form early on, then switched to video mode and attempted to record it on video too. i stopped recoding about 45 seconds in and moved closer to 200 east hoping to get less flare from the street light, then began recording again. the video is dark, and i'm not certain the entire event is visible since the object was less bright as it expanded.

as the object neared the roof line of the buildings to the south my friend and i ran to 200 east hoping to regain a visual of the object, but i could not see it anymore. there were commercial airplanes, stars, streetlights, etc. all very clear, and non remotely like this object.
content.summary: Orange light in slow decent and shape change to very large orage orb.

content.detailedDescription: I was curious to see if anybody else saw the fireball back on march 31, 1990 around 9 or 10 p.M. that followed the beach  along the coastline in gulf shores,alabama.  it was barely 50 ft out from the edge of the waterline  and maybe about 50 ft above the  water. so much so that you could see the flames eluminating the water when it went by. we were at the old alabama point bridge boat launch.. there were people there launching  a boat but they were already out in the water . but i know they had to have saw it.  anybody from the hangout  which is where it was coming from as a small ball of fire  as it came up the coastline we realized how huge it was .. it was being maneuvered... not a comet . it was probably every bit as large as large water tower . i"ve lived in the area all my life. by the way it was me & my husband. we both saw it.   you are welcome to call or email  me . my cell # is 251-979 -2161.  i told people not many ..Cause you know they really do  not believe you. i posted it on a ufo site  once but did not get a respond .  it went on past us  headed along the coast of florida. now that this  ufo stuff is so out of the closet . and everybody seems to be interested i would love to know if someone else reported it..
content.summary: Reported to hq - rlh added case fireball

content.detailedDescription:
While doing some fall planting on a clear day at 2:20 pm i took the last few ounces of water from my water bottle by tilting the bottom to the sky. while my neck was craned back and i was looking directly overhead i saw a small amorphous bit of light traveling fast north to south. the whole sighting lasted only 2 to 3 seconds. the bit of light moved left to right a couple of times then traveled a little further in the same n-s direction and was gone before it hit the horizon. as soon a i noticed the light and the speed i knew it was not a plane or a bird or a reflection or swamp gas.
as soon as it was gone i called my wife to tell her. i was quite excited. as i watched it i yelled "holy crap".
content.summary: Small bit of light moving to fast be be a plane n to s.

content.detailedDescription: I was referred to you by a friend, georg breckmann, regarding my observation of a search light coming out of the east boundary of huntsville, alabama. it actually may be on top of monte sano mountain where i am residing. i have not noticed this situation before and the trajectory of the light gives the indication that it may be coming from the top of the mountain which has not been home to such a light before. i didn't want to use the 'mufon sighting report' to report this with, so could you please direct me to someone who may live in this area that knows what may be happening here? it occurred sunday evening, november 3rd, at approximately 6:15 - 8:00pm. thank you for your time and hopefully this turns out to be nothing at all to be alarmed about.
content.summary: Reported to hq - rlh added as a case - light on monte sano

content.detailedDescription: I had just opened the back door to throw some rubbish into the dustbin when i saw what i thought was a rocket (guy fawkes) but it looked like it was getting higher and higher (to high) which made me watch it for longer.I then realised that it was something coming from the west but after about 10 seconds or maybe a bit more it started to dim down as it got closer until it totally dimmed just before it got to being almost overhead in just the same way the iss does when going into the earths shadow. it was as best as i could tell going at about the same speed as the iss. the most striking thing was that it most certainly looked like a rocket with a trail of what certainly looked like fire. regards ricky.
content.summary: Best if you read below i think.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside last night hoping to hear and maybe locate the direction of the loud booms we had been hearing for the last 3 weeks. the night was cold (57 degrees), clear skies with lots of stars, light wind, and i was sitting facing 255 degrees west. i had my cell phone, a digital camera, and a pair of binoculars. i used the cell phone compass to determine my direction and the voice memo application to record the conditions and my observations. there were many aircraft, jet and helicopter flying in the area, all with appropriate red or white strobe lights flashing.

while scanning the skies periodically i noticed a grayish cylinder object float across the sky almost directly above me from a ne to sw direction.  the object was definitely not a flock of birds or floating debris as the shape never wavered or formed into any other shape. it remained a cigar shape. the object made no sound, had no lights, and had no contrail. it was definitely lighter in color than the night sky and i did not observe it passing in front of any stars. there were no aircraft in front or behind the object and i could not estimate it's altitude, but i would have to estimate it's speed in excess of 500 mph. albuquerque airport is about 15 miles to the sw of my location and is adjacent to kirtland afb. all aircraft traffic observed was either in a north to south direction at a lower altitude or east to west at a higher altitude used by commercial aircraft.

before i could point my camera in the objects direction it passed outside of my eyesight or was made difficult to see due to the porch lights of the house across the street to the left and also from the porch lights of the house to my immediate left. the object never returned and there was no sign of pursuit or investigation from other aircraft.
content.summary: Grey/silver cylinder passed overhead without lights or sound

content.detailedDescription:
Where were we?: on 10th ��� 11th november 2012 saturday-sunday night ��� sunday 3:30 am to 5:30 am (ist 03:30 to ist 05:30).

location reading taken from handheld gps: north 19 deg 01.147' & east 073 deg 17.087' ��� matheran, panorama point, maharashtra, india.

what were we doing?: stargazing with telescopes (150 mm newtonian reflector on dobsonian with 25 mm & 10 mm eyepieces).

what made us first notice the object?: a glow in the sky as big as the full moon and having a similar brightness of the moonlight around it. imagine the size of full moon and there is no moon in there!

what did we think when the object was first noticed?: a nebula so prominent and how could we have missed it!

description of object: the spaceship had 3 pinpoints of lights. like 3 fingers (index, middle & ring fingers) of our hand. unequal in height. here the spaceship had index finger light most bright and ahead than the other two. the other two pinpoint light sources were dim as compared to index finger���s pinpoint light source and were equal in brightness.

actions & motions of the object: slaty grey colored waves like wifi signal symbol were emanating on the front & the back side of the spaceship. it moved slowly but definitely. we know artificial satellites like iss or hst move fast in an arc, having a visible pass of few minutes with naked eyes. this moved in a straight line and then made a turn to descend and then ascend. when it made the turn, the wifi signal symbol-like waves emanating from it, changed their pattern, to resemble a floral pattern, which is illustrated in the ufo pdf uploaded below. as it moved to one side, the waves emanated from its opposite side, appearing to propel it or leave from its exhaust. 

first seen near star canopus > took a turn near star alphard > last seen near star procyon.

the travel path was as long as the big dipper asterism in the sky!

our feelings, reactions & actions during and after the sighting of the object: as soon as we saw it, through the telescope, binoculars and unaided  eyes, there were shouts of joy and ecstasy! ours was a mixed group of people of mature age and understanding. there were multiple questions as to what could it be. we tried contacting local astronomical societies, who all were sleeping then. we continued our observations non-stop, recording its movement against the background stars.
we didn't have a camera / d-slr to photograph or video-record this event. the mobile cameras could not record the faint light of this far away object.

how did we lose the sight of the object? we didn't. for almost 2 hours, we kept on seeing it. it did become faint as it went far away from us. but the most important thing was, it stayed there. it got lost in the haze of the rising sun as it dawned. the sky became too bright to observe any further.

please check the pdf file uploaded for diagrams & star charts.
content.summary: 3 pinpoint lights emanating waves on 2 sides like wifi signal, moving slowly through the sky, changing directions.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just come out of a theater with a friend, and we were walking east, back to his apartment. about halfway down the block, i noticed a bright light in the sky to my left, and said something like 'hey, there���s an airplane.' my friend looked, and pointing out the orange color, said that he didn't think it was an airplane. he pulled out his phone to take a picture, the light was rather small at this point, but quite bright. i followed his lead, and used my phone to record the light. in the video it only showed up in a short blip a couple of times. 

the light was moving in an arc to the south and as it traveled, it grew in size. the intensity of the light seemed to disperse over the surface area, becoming more dim, and also seemed to undulate, bringing to mind a jellyfish, or plastic bag tumbling slowly on a breeze, though the shape of it stayed constantly spherical. both my friend and i were rather in awe at this point, and i again tried to film the object, which did not show up in my camera. we thought nearby streetlights might be interfering, so moved down the block a little bit to the west, toward the object. my phone camera still would not recognize it. it was slightly smaller than a dime at this point, and stayed this brightness, shape, and size from the peak of it���s height in the sky until it disappeared behind the buildings at the end of the block across the street to the south. we ran to the end of the block to try and see it again, but it was no longer visible. some of our friends were on the corner, but hadn���t noticed anything in the sky. 

it seemed to keep a constant speed during the two minutes or so that we observed it. it also seemed to rise and descend, thought that could have been an illusion due to our point of observation. the most impressive thing about it was the undulating quality of it���s surface, and the fairly swift, but smooth transference to that state from a bright concentrated point of light.
content.summary: Small bright light of orange color moved from north to south in an arc, growing in size and reducing in brightness ultimatly dissapearing behind buildings at end of block.

content.detailedDescription: I have already reported on a orange orb oct 13 2010 also from my apt complex but this sighting was on may 2nd 2013 i was walking to my car to go to work exactly 9am it was a clear blue sky nice day i saw  the full moon in the sky and while looking at it a flash right next to the moon was appearing every second and instantly knew this is very odd and from experiice studied it to see if it was a real ufo like i have seen before in the same area, exept this was a white flashing light not an orange glowing ball, i instantly called my step dad who was at the complex and said go out side now and look at the moon and youl see a flashing ufo and he saw it the craft was silver and either had a shape to it and was rotaing and reflected the sun light every second or it was artificial produced like being shown to us. it hovered did not asssend or desend just hovered i was looking right at it for 10 minutes even stopped a guy walking and pointed it out to him then it started slowly drifting right until it was behind the tree tops, i was searhing youtube all day for anyone else who may have also wtnessed it and photographed it i called news 12 only to ask if anyone called in to report this because the other orange orb ufo sighting i saw in person the article was on local news but they only filmed the sky and people looking up after it was gone horizon to horizon  on 7 seconds orange orb oct 13 2010, the craft on may 2 2013 was silver could be reflective lite could be made light could be power field maybe the silver ccraft can go as fast as the orange orb and when it needs that power the field appears and becomes orange idk.
content.summary: Flashing hovering silver not orb craft emiting either artifical or reflected light every second for 15 miutes

content.detailedDescription: I was in luther park in wisconson on a church retreat. it was a cloudless night. i was star gazing with my churches pastor when we noticed a satalite we were watching it when all of the sudden this giant ball of blue light that was surrounded by an aura of light blue light appeared out of nowhere by a grouping of four stars in the shape of a diamond. when it appeared it was already in motion it made no noise at all but it traveled faster than the world air speed record and traveled straight towards a grouping of stars that resembled orion's belt but dimmer but the middle one was one of the brightest stars in the sky that's the one this object was headed for it managed to travel what must have been at least 50 miles is about 0.5 seconds. it looked kind of like if you take all of the stars in the sky and put them next to each other like in an atom but you make it brighter than that and make it give off more light than that. when it got to the 3 star grouping it just disappeared, gone without a trace. right after it disappeared is when it hit me, i was thinking there was no possible way that was man made. then i wondered where was the satalite, the pastor that i was with had the star walk app open on his phone the object was not on there but the it said the satalite was right next to the grouping of four stars but it wasn't there i looked the next night but it still wasn't there and so i still don't know what it was. i still feel shock and awe about it and i still feel a little shaken by it.
content.summary: Came out of nowhere broke a speed record then vanished

content.detailedDescription: Went out side to get some air around 6pm saw a star like light in the sky moving very slow sw got the video cam out starting recording...Don't know what it is but i recorded it 3 days last week in the same place s-sw.
content.summary: Went out side to get some air around 6pm saw a star like light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house as normal i live in lititz pa and his neighborhood is called cobblestone. my 3 friends and i were hanging out on the back pourch around 11 oclock at night. when i look up above my friends tree in his back yard and see a rectangular space craft with a white small rectangle in the middle. the outer color was a very bright neon green that light up so much. behind it was a aura type of energy or stream almost in a wave pattern. and it covered and moved to my east slowly till it hovered across the tree fully i cryed out to my friends to look and my eyes started to tear up because ive waited so many ancient aliens and other interviews with old area 51 works and i wanted to believe it all but was truly doubtful till that night. me crying almost literally to my friends to look and me yelling at the top of my lungs and pointed...It vanished. or it seemed to look like it. i honestly, and this might sound crazy..But i think they heard me yell and probably turned on some type of cloak. i only say that because where it hovered and stopped it turned black with the sky and all the bright colors just vanished. but i could still see a black outline of the rectangle, and in all the stars out in the sky i could see a patch of them missing gone right where the ship just vanished at. like the stars where hiding behind the cloaked craft. and i turned to my friends and they saw nothing. it all happened in about 10;15 seconds time. two of my friends were facing me and one was inside on his way outside, and they were shocked by my crying and me shaking they really thought i was joking at first, and i told em everything i saw and two didnt believe two of my best friends...My other did he was always a believer. but i will never forget what i had seen that night. and really know we are not alone in this world.
content.summary: Neon green/white rectangluar space craft with a trail of a arura energy with orbs in its stream,

content.detailedDescription: Left at 6:45 to an event from my house.  sky was pretty clear. observed on southwest a huge oval shape light.  the significant observations were the size, the fact that was very windy but the light was perfectly stationary.  there were no blinking lights.  there was absolutely no sound coming from the craft.  the height of the object was strangely lower than any planes that fly in the area. and, just to validate that it was not an astrological body me, my sister, and my wife went to observe the website after one hour and 40 minutes and it was no place to be seen.   me and my wife have also observed two red lights hovering together in the same area.  these red balls were much smaller and they were moving.  the red balls were much lower then the most recent huge, oval shaped yellow light. the most recent yellow light was not a helicopter, it was not a plane, it was not a satellite, and it was not a star or any astrological body.  i am pretty familiar with all of these in a night sky.
content.summary: Huge oval shape bright faded yellow light. stationary. no blinking lights. no sound.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
November 3, 2013 @ 6:40 pm
on my way to work pm shift driving on route 32 westbound through batavia then eastgate. i viewed a bright, stationary white light. no movement. no other stars or celestial shining lights viewed while driving. 31% cloud cover according to weather station online report. the light must have been at very high altitude because i traveled for about 6 miles due west and it stayed in the same exact position from my view through the driver's side window. i estimate it at about 60 degrees above the horizon. i thought it might be a geosynchronous satelite but i don't think i have ever seen one before so i would not know. the white light was at least as bright as the landing lights of a large plane were on while in flight. i do recall seeing the running lights of a plane, white with some red, somewhere in the vicinity of this light, though they did not seem to be close to each other. i am quite certain that i veiwed this same object one night at home a night last week. my house is only about 4 miles from the point where i first noticed this tonight. both times struck me as unusual because of the brightness of a totally stationary white light many times more luminous and considerably larger than that of a pinpoint starlight-like object i've ever seen in the night sky. while watching from my home's driveway there was no sound. that did not seem strange as the thing seemed to me to be very far away. tonight i tried without success to find information on the internet that could explain this. i could not find any data that might site an orbiting satilite as the possible origin and no ufo reports similar near my location. i lost sight of the light when i changed direction and entered hilly terrain. my sense is sort of like feeling suspicion, and wonder of what simple, ordinary explanation there probably is for this thing. and if there isn't one then seem to have a feeling of trepidation.
content.summary: Star-like approx 20 + x's bigger & brighter, no other stars visible, miles ++ up, exact same spot for 6mi travel in car

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on dewees road in shelby county, oh just after 8pm tonight. i noticed this large white and multi colored orb pulsating about 45 degrees up from the treeline.  i kept watching it as i drove and saw it go extreemly bright white and huge for a few seconds before it changed size to very small but still bright white then it just disapeared.  i ask my husband the whole time "what is that bright thing in the sky".  at first he thought it was a star but when it disapeared he was as surprised and puzzled as i am.  there was an airplane flying from the north going south closer to us right before the orb disapeard and it was still flying after the orb disapeared.  id say the airplane was flying at 30 or 35 degrees above the treeline.  it is a clear night and we can see the stars.  no noise was heard.
content.summary: Large white & multi colored stationary orb. went brighter & larger then small & just disappeared. no faa lights on it. husband saw it too.

content.detailedDescription:
At 04:30pm on july 19, 1952, the attention of customs inspector sr. domingo troncoso, then with the peruvian customs office at puerto maldonado on the jungle frontier with bolivia, was called to a very strange cigar-shaped flying object over the river area. the big dirigible-shaped craft was flying horizontally and fairly low in the sky, passing from right to left from the observers position. it was leaving a dense trail of thick smoke, vapor, or substance on its wake. this object was a real, structured, physical machine and may be seen from its reflection in the waters of the madre de dios river underneath it. the object was estimated to be over a hundred feet long.

a newspaper account read in part:

"the colour of the head or nucleus of this disc was an intense orange. the direction was south to north, was visible from 1 to 2 minutes, leaving a thick vaporous trail which floated for more than 15 minutes. the altitude was more or less 2500 to 3000 feet."
content.summary: A big dirigible-shaped craft was flying horizontally and fairly low in the sky, passing from right to left from the observers position.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at my picnic table in front yard. i was looking at the stars and all of a sudden 5 bright star like objects traveling at high speed traveled in my view area. these were not conventional aircraft. they were separate vehicles moving at a very high rate of speed. i have been in aviation for 34 years and the only word i can use to describe them is "wow". they appeared to be in a formation.  it reminded me of a fighter group except at the altitude i believe they were at they would have to be traveling i. excess of 3000 miles per hour. no sound whatsoever. i was amazed at the speed and coordination. they did not manuever or turn but they were so tight and quick i let out an "holy sh*t" again i have an extensive background in aviation and whatever these were they surely were not anything that i am aware of in existense in this worlds inventory of aircraft civilian or military.
content.summary: 5 bright object flying in sync. high speed

content.detailedDescription: Looke out front of my house say a white torndado shaped cloud..It was stationary and hovered over the treetops..I thought we were going to have a storm but sky was blue and clear no rain or thunderstorms.I thought it was strange how long it hovered over trees so i took some pictures as i took the pictures i noticed under the cloud were five orb shaped objects that moved slowly under the cloud in a straight line and moved along until they were gone..The cloud stayed for 15 min then slowly disappeared.
content.summary: Saw white tornado looking cloud in front of my house over treetops, to the left of cloud was 5 bright colored orbs moving in straight line under cloud

content.detailedDescription: It was mid summer, we was preparing for a yard sale. i don't know why but i turned around and looked exactly where the craft was. i exclaimed to the three other people present look! and pointed. i couldn't say anything else to describe what i was seeing.The other three gathered beside me and behind me as i pointed at this craft. i remember lowering my arm,i cant say exactly how long we stood in that spot, then the craft rotated parallel to the ground and menuvered west ever so slowly to a small cloud. i looked at the one person to my left and asked "are you ok" she never responded to my question but stared at me as though she was in a daze. i turned and observed the other two robotically folding and raking the yard.About 10 to 15 seconds passed by and the three others who was present picked up pace and started chatting. not a single one of us said a word 0f what just happened.   the beauty of this craft.......,human words cannot due justice. i can say it was as highly polished pure silver. there was no windows or doors.It had a slight domed top and the bottem was slightly convexed. the strangest thing i noticed was it had no shadow. i like to say it was self luminous non-radiant. this event was mentioned in a statement to the government in 2001. since then my personal life has been completely turned up-side-down. a psychologist came to me and said  "they are just trying to get you to hurt someone"  .......Im scared but i fear nobody. this is my statement of events. may god help us all.
content.summary: I turned and alerted 3 others, all observed, struck dazed, saw craft menuver behind single small cloud

content.detailedDescription: Early afternoon. belgium, walking hoogkamerstraat in temse, direction gewestweg to go hitch-hiking to sint-niklaas; halfway hoogkamerstraat i noticed something in the sky and showed my hubby, we kept on looking, it was so strange. a man across the street started watching too. no clue what it was, so kept on looking. it hovered incredibly slow, very high in the sky. never knew anything could go so slowly! but it moved. less then step-foot speed, much much less. it moved from left to right in one straight line. so slow. no sound, no extortions, no wings. it was a massive object. must have been huge, as it was so high up in the sky and yet the size of a ball. oval shaped. strange colour, like mother of pearl but without all the other colours. pure mother of pearl, but a bit different. never saw a similar colour in my life. no windows, no lights. there weren't any planes nor helicopters, nor balloons. the sun was high in the sky to the left. there were absolutely no clouds. the sky was bright blue. it was a lovely soon to be spring day which felt like spring already. with three people we kept on staring to the object. then all of a sudden it went up at such an amazing speed as if you have something on an elastic that was stretched and let loose. and it went out of sight within a second. we looked at the man across the street who was shaking his head in unbelief as well and walked on. kept looking up in the sky to see whether it would come back or see it somewhere else. never saw it again. later that week talked to friends about it who looked at us like we were idiots and laughed. never reported it. a couple of weeks later ufo sightings were all over the news. military involved and all. still didn't report it. got laughed at enough already. and the shape i witnessed was different than the shape witnessed in the ardens. 23 years later and i'm still trying to find out what i saw ...
content.summary: Huge hovering oval, mother of pearl coloured
